overview_of_class:
Communicative method. Development of speaking, listening, conversation, and grammar skills in a cultural context.

Three class meetings a week.
name: Elementary Spanish
title: WCAS SPANISH 101-1-20 Elementary Spanish
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Spanish Studies students.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Communicative method. Development of speaking, listening, conversation, and grammar skills in a cultural context.

Three class meetings a week.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
For students who have never studied Spanish or studied Spanish less than two years in high school.
No P/N
Attendance at first class is required.
*NOTE: If you have taken any Spanish courses in high school upon entrance to Northwestern University, please take the placement exam online before registering for this course!

class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory
